thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie
thread.title: Henry Harding

author: Henry Harding
title: Henry Harding
text: I joined Energia for the price through Bonkers.ie. I did not receive a bill after over three months so I contacted Energia, they only have an 1890 number which meant I would have to pay extra for the call from my mobile phone so I sent an E mail. After a few days I received a reply that the bill had been posted. After a second e mail I got my account number and was able to sign up online and see my bill. I was very pleased that it matched the price I got on Bonkers. Overall I am happy with Energia but would be happier if they had an 01 number.
